title: sent in a support ticket about anniversary gift, no reply, did i not format it right or something?
body: maybe i should just be patient, it's only been like 2 days, how long do tickets ussually take?

replies.body:
We're currently pretty slammed with tickets, so replies will be a bit more delayed than normal. I appreciate your patience so far. We'll get a specialist with you as soon as we can.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
